short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Screen recorder and video capture tool with webcam, system audio, drawing tools for Chrome

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: This is a powerful screen recording tool that supports webpage recording, webcam capture, system audio recording, and real-time annotation tools.
